name: EMQ Inc.
description: Operator of a financial settlement network intended to optimize cross-border remittances. The company operates a cross-border settlement network that provides affordable, efficient and transparent financial settlement for global businesses, enabling users to have a settlement network that makes cross-border remittances streamlined, neutral, low-cost, secure, and real-time.
one_liner: Operator of a financial settlement network intended to optimize cross-border remittances.
